nodes.text: This old Praetor-class Star Battlecruiser was one of several Star Battlecruisers used by the Galactic Republic and the Galactic Empire.

The vessel was left as a derelict by the Empire and was scavenged for parts by members of the Rebel Alliance. They stole reactor systems from the lifeless hulk and used them to power the Echo Base on Hoth. The ship's reactors became integral to the security of the base, during the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY.
